# Professional Photography & Video

Chicago’s premier photography and video production company. Serving the
Chicago area for over 20 years, our creative photographers, videographers and
editors are highly experienced and professional.

Request a Quote

## INTRODUCTION REEL

We believe that incorporating professional photography and video into your
marketing strategy is the best way to build your brand and attract more
customers.

## PHOTOGRAPHY SERVICES

In today’s digital age, you can’t afford to go without creative photo or video
content as part of your marketing strategy. Here are just some of the services
we can provide.

###### Corporate Branding

###### BRAND MARKETING

###### Events & Meetings

###### CORPORATE EVENTS

###### Headshots & Portraits

###### EXECUTIVE PORTRAITS

###### Conventions & Trade Shows

###### Headshots & Portraits

###### Industry Specific Photography

###### Industry Specific Photography

###### Product Photography

###### Product Photography

## VIDEO PRODUCTION SERVICES

Video production is becoming more popular than ever, and research has shown
that adding video as part of your overall marketing strategy greatly increases
brand awareness and makes your company more captivating to your potential and
current customers.

###### Corporate Branding

###### PROMOTIONAL VIDEOS

###### Events and Conventions

###### EVENT HIGHLIGHTS

###### Specialty

###### INDUSTRIAL

“54% of consumers want to see more video content from brands and businesses.
This goes to show that the demand for video content is rapidly increasing.”
-www.oberlo.com

Read More

WHY CHOOSE US “Thank you so much to Jimmy, Gabe, and Mac for providing us
really great service for our event earlier this month. I loved the quality of
photos Gabe took and Jimmy was really helpful with getting us all set prior to
the event. I love the online tool he uses when sending the quote which allows
you to directly send emails and questions prior to signing. I highly recommend
Chicago Corporate Photo & Video!” - Natasha F.  WHY CHOOSE US “I highly
recommend Chicago Corporate Photography & Video! They are a great firm, and
very easy to work with. The team is friendly, collaborative and responsive. We
hired them on to produce 9 short videos, and we were blown away with the final
look and quality. We are absolutely thrilled with the results and will use
them for future projects!” - Blessilda E.  WHY CHOOSE US “Our company needed
nearly 50 headshots in order to update our company website, and Jimmy did a
great job as our photographer! He was organized, easy to work with, flexible
when we had a few makeups, and provided the final headshots in very quick
turnaround. Jimmy gave us great value, and we look forward to working with him
for any of our future headshot needs.” - Sarah B.  WHY CHOOSE US “We chose
Chicago Corporate Photography & Video to shoot a video series of short
lectures at the day-long conference. Jimmy handled the entire process with
professional ease. He had great communication and response times, from initial
contact to final product. On site at the event, Jimmy and his staff were
pleasant, on time, well prepared, and organized. The turnaround time for
production was quick, and the final product looked and sounded great and was
well-appreciated by our client. ” \- Aja M.  WHY CHOOSE US “Working with Jimmy
was a breeze. The process to book, and pay for services was easy and the
turnaround time was exceptional. I went in for a corporate shot, which took
just a few minutes, reviewed the photos and made my selection. Jimmy, offers
unlimited shots to find your best side, and angle. I will recommend Jimmy for
all our corporate needs moving forward.” - Noel M.

“The team at Chicago Corporate Photography and Video are amazing! They were
able to deliver above and beyond in such a short amount of time. I highly
recommend them for any video and photography needs!” -Rae A, Chicago, IL

Why Choose Us

## INDUSTRIES WE SPECIALIZE IN

We provide the very best photo and video services in the industry while
ensuring that everything we do is focused on making your job easier.
